description: Stylish glossy X325BV-FHD 31.5-Inch Diagonal LCD 1080P HDTV features crystal clear LCD display that emits brighter and more robust colors with 3 HDMI to connect all your high def components all at once. An ultra fast response time of 8ms to create crisper and sharper image that is flicker free for a complete entertainment experience with 1920x1080 resolution, 60Hz refresh rate, 16:9 Wide screen resolution, and 10Watts x 2 audio sound. All while saving energy. With the additional feature of a USB port helps further expand the functionality of your TV, allowing users to listen to music and view digital pictures quickly and conveniently. This HDTV is a perfect addition to any home décor, especially in the kitchen where the ultra-slim design and eye-catching finish for a high-end, modern look.Inputs: HDMI x3, Cable, Antenna Input x1, Component (YPbPr) Input x1, Composite Video x1, VGA x1,Audio In x1, USB Input x1.Outputs:  SPDIF Audio Output x1 (Coaxial Type), Analog Audio Output x1 (L + R), Headphone Output  x1.One Year Limited Parts and Labor warranty.
title: Sceptre X325BV-FHD 32-Inch 1080p 60Hz LCD HDTV (Black)
